fn.p: Edited by: Vlada B. Urlacher, Heinrich Heine Universität Düsseldorf, Germany
Reviewed by: Fu-Li Li, Qingdao Institute of Bioenergy and Bioprocess Technology (CAS), China; Seraphim Papanikolaou, Agricultural University of Athens, Greece
This article was submitted to Bioprocess Engineering, a section of the journal Frontiers in Bioengineering and Biotechnology
